attributes.action: Make laws to prevent MPs voting without first obtaining a mandate by referendum of their constituency electorate.
attributes.additional_details: We currently have 650 MPs who do nothing, nowadays, but support the party political line, ensuring that they keep their corrupt party leaders in post and themselves at the taxpayer funded trough.  Representation of the people is not something which has happened in the HofC for decades and this trend MUST be reversed.  As our senior law officer you have a moral and legal obligation to ensure that our electeds do what they are supposed to do and not merely use their votes as pawns to their masters and to protect themselves.  If you cannot see that, or worse, you know that obligation and choose to ignore it in favour of party politics, then you need to get a different job.  THE BRITISH PEOPLE DESERVE BETTER THAN WHAT YOU OFFER.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter
